text: 1:2 Rom 1:7; 8:29; 2 Tesalonika 2:13; Hibru 10:22; 12:24; 2 Pita 1:2God kamaghɨn ifonge, ia Krais Iesusɨn akam baraghtɨ, an ghuzim ia rueghtɨ ia Godɨn damazimɨn zuegham. God Afeziam fomɨra ia gɨfo, egha ia mɨsevezɨ ia an gumazamizibar otifi. Godɨn Duam ia gamizɨma ia an gumazamizibar otifi, tuavir kamɨn a ia mɨsefe. Ezɨ God bar ian apangkuvigha ia gamima ia navir amɨrizimɨn iti.
